Cross-referencing
Penguin bills in a figure

library(ggplot2)
ggplot(data = penguins, 
       mapping = aes(x = bill_depth_mm,
                     y = bill_length_mm,
                     colour = species,
                     shape = species)) +
  geom_point()







Figure 1





See Figure 1 for a nice figure.

library(dplyr)


Attaching package: 'dplyr'


The following objects are masked from 'package:stats':

    filter, lag


The following objects are masked from 'package:base':

    intersect, setdiff, setequal, union

library(gt)

penguins |>
  group_by(island) |>
  summarise(mean_body_mass_g = mean(body_mass_g, na.rm = TRUE)) |>
  gt() |> 
  fmt_number(mean_body_mass_g) |>
  cols_label(island = "Island",
             mean_body_mass_g = "Mean Body Mass (g)") |>
  cols_align(columns = island, align = "left")
